title: Development of Instructional Design Strategies to Enhance Compatibility Between School Learning and Working Memory

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational cognitive psychology theories and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Development of instructional design principles to enhance language learning efficiency by analyzing working memory constraints in asynchronous learning environments utilizing learners' personal devices.

learning_goals: Explain educational applications of working memory models (Cognitive Load Theory, Multi-Component Working Memory, etc.)
Diagnose cognitive load factors occurring in language learning processes and derive improvement strategies
Apply three or more instructional design principles optimized for online learning environments to practical cases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
